column1: the  existing  SORP  are  compulsory  for  an  efficient  mechanism  to  select
suitable candidates for the posts in the Engineering Service of the CEB.
In those circumstances, it is the view of this Court that the Respondents
have not acted in excess of authority. The new SORP (P4) is made in the
best interest of the CEB and the general public.
For the foregoing reasons, the Applications are dismissed without costs.
